alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 10:17PM CST until November 25 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ FRIDAY TO 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Friday to 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow will come in two rounds. There may be little to no snow Friday night before the second round begins on Saturday. Locally higher snow amounts may occur Saturday for Logan, Gove, Sheridan and part of Thomas counties.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
